items.content_html: AI Playground is lightweight, self-hostable AI chat interface designed for quick experimentation with various AI APIs. No logins, no persistence‚Äîjust a clean, temporary sandbox where you can test prompts, tweak AI settings, and interact with models in real time.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: This project is an Educase India Node.js assignment. It features a lightweight Express.js and Prisma backend with MySQL, offering APIs to add schools and list them by proximity to a user's location. Optimized for serverless deployment.

items.content_html: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.
items.title: cedricpierre/fluentity-core: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.

items.content_html: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. üêôüåü

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
